summary: CTA routing fix verified - All CTAs across SunoLegal site now navigate to internal pages (/waitlist and /lawyers-join) instead of directly opening Google Forms. Google Forms are only available as secondary 'Prefer detailed survey?' options inside the internal pages.
passed_tests: Navbar 'Join Waitlist' button navigates to /waitlist (not Google Form)
Navbar 'For Lawyers' button navigates to /lawyers-join (not Google Form)
Footer 'Join Waitlist (Users)' button navigates to /waitlist
Footer 'Lawyers – Join Early' button navigates to /lawyers-join
Hero section 'Join Waitlist' button navigates to /waitlist
Hero section 'I'm a Lawyer – Join Early' link navigates to /lawyers-join
CTA section 'Join Waitlist (Users)' navigates to /waitlist
CTA section 'I'm a Lawyer' navigates to /lawyers-join
Pricing page 'Join Waitlist' navigates to /waitlist
Pricing page 'I'm a Lawyer' navigates to /lawyers-join
Pricing page has NO direct Google Form links
FAQ page 'Join Waitlist (Users)' navigates to /waitlist
FAQ page 'I'm a Lawyer' navigates to /lawyers-join
FAQ page has NO direct Google Form links
About page 'Join Waitlist (Users)' navigates to /waitlist
About page 'I'm a Lawyer' navigates to /lawyers-join
About page has NO direct Google Form links
For Lawyers page 'Apply as Lawyer' navigates to /lawyers-join
For Lawyers page 'Apply Now' CTA navigates to /lawyers-join
For Lawyers page has NO direct Google Form links
/waitlist page has internal user form with submit button
/waitlist page has 'Open Detailed Google Form' as secondary option (opens in new tab)
/waitlist Lawyers tab has 'Open Lawyer Google Form' as secondary option
/lawyers-join page has internal form with all fields (name, email, city, practice area, experience)
/lawyers-join page has 'Open Lawyer Google Form' as secondary option (opens in new tab)
/lawyers-join page uses correct lawyer Google Form URL
Backend /api/waitlist endpoint saves user data to DB
Backend /api/lawyer-interest endpoint saves lawyer data to DB
Navigation from Navbar 'Join Waitlist' goes to /waitlist (not Google Form)
Navigation from Navbar 'For Lawyers' goes to /lawyers-join (not Google Form)
seed_data_creation: Test data created via API calls for waitlist and lawyer-interest submissions
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CTA routing has been fixed. CTAs now navigate to internal pages (/waitlist and /lawyers-join) instead of directly opening Google Forms. Google Forms are preserved as secondary options with 'Prefer detailed survey?' text inside the internal pages. Backend uses MOCK in-memory Firestore database. Email sending is MOCKED (no real Resend API key).

mocked_apis.email: Resend email is mocked (no API key configured)
